body_html: Finally I have figured out how to use scan with batch. So I have written some simple code for dynamic RNN and GRU. Have conducted a little hack as Tensorflow was raising low level error. The github repo is here
body_text: Finally I have figured out how to use scan with batch. So I have written some simple code for dynamic  RNN and GRU. Have conducted a little hack as Tensorflow was raising low level error.  The github repo is here
body: Finally I have figured out how to use scan with batch. So I have written some simple code for dynamic  [RNN](http://knhuq.github.io/RNN.html) and [GRU](http://knhuq.github.io/GRU.html). Have conducted a little hack as Tensorflow was raising low level error.  The github repo is [here](https://github.com/KnHuq/Dynamic_RNN_Tensorflow)
